properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yēsu nīkē jayaṁ jayamu (2) Nīve lōka pāla kuḍavu (2) Sarva sr̥ṣṭiki sr̥ṣṭi kartavu Sarvalōka rakṣa kuḍavu Jai jai anucu nī kē pāḍedaṁ (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Janmin̄ce jagamuna mā nava rūpamulō Prāyaścittamu kai tā ne baliyāye Pāpiyaina mā na vuni rakṣimpa Śiluva nekki tana prā ṇamu niccen Hallelūyā bhuvipaina (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maraṇamu dvārā antamāye balulu Ta na sa mā dhi, sarvaṁ kappen Tirigi lē cuṭacē, sarvaṁ nūtanamāye Sampūrṇamuga ōḍipōye mr̥tyu samādhi Hallelūyā bhuvipaina (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Svargaṁ veḷḷi, goppa svāgatamonden Taṇḍri kuḍiprakkana, ā yana kūrcuṇḍen Rājula rājai, prabhuvula prabhuvai Ponde adhikāramu paralōkamupai Hallelūyā bhuvipaina (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tana rūpamunaku mārpu, niṣṭa māye Sr̥ṣṭikaṇṭe mundu tāne saṅkalpin̄ce Lōka duḥkhamu nuṇḍi manaṁ tappin̄cukoni Tana rūpamu nondi tanatō nuṇḍedaṁ Hallelūyā bhuvipaina (2){/lang-eng}
